q:
ou)de\n ga\r
ou(/tw gau=ron kai\ traxu\ kai\ du/sarkton w(s a)nh\r e)/fu
p.#text:
*pla/twna *kurhnai=oi pareka/loun no/mous te graya/menon au)toi=s a)polipei=n kai\ diakosmh=sar th\n politei/an, o( de\ parh|th/sato fh/sas xalepo\n ei)=nai *kurhnai/ois

nomoqetei=n ou(/tws eu)tuxou=sin 
eu)pragi/as dokou/shs e)pilambano/menos. dio\ toi=s a)/rxousi

xalepo/n e)sti su/mboulon peri\ a)rxh=s; gene/sqai to\n ga\r lo/gon w(/sper a)/rxonta parade/casqai fobou=ntai,

mh\ th=s e)cousi/as au)tw=n ta)gaqo\n kolou/sh|
tw=| kaqh/konti doulwsa/menos;. ou) ga\r i)/sasi ta\ *qeopo/mpou tou= *spartiatw=n basile/ws, o(\s prw=tos e)n *spa/rth| toi=s basileu/ousi katami/cas tou\s *)efo/rous, ei)=t' o)neidizo/menos u(po\ th=s gunaiko/s, ei) toi=s paisi\n
 e)la/ttona paradw/sei th\n a)rxh\n h(=s pare/labe,   ei)=pen   to\ ga\r sfodro\n a)nei\s kai\ a)/kraton au)th=s a(/ma tw=| fqo/nw|
 die/fuge to\n ki/ndunon. kai/toi *qeo/pompos me\n ei)s e(te/rous to\ th=s a)rxh=s w(/sper r(eu/matos mega/lou paroxeteusa/menos,

o(/son a)/llois e)/dwken, au(tou=

perie/ principem *i)neriiditiim.
koyen: o( d' e)k filosofi/as tw=| a)/rxonti pa/redros kai\ fu/lac e)gkatoikisqei\s lo/gos, w(/sper eu)eci/as th=s duna/mews to\ e)pisfale\s a)fairw=n, a)polei/pei to\
u(giai=non.

a)lla\ nou=n ou)k e)/xontes oi( polloi\ tw=n basile/wn kai\ a)rxo/ntwn mimou=ntai tou\s a)te/xnous a)ndriantopoiou/s,
oi(\ nomi/zousi mega/lous kai\ a(drou\s fai/nesqai tou\s kolossou/s, a)\n diabebhko/tas sfo/dra
 kai\ diatetame/nous kai\ kexhno/tas pla/swsi kai\ ga\r
 ou(=toi baru/thti fwnh=s kai\ ble/mmatos traxu/thti kai\ duskoli/a| tro/pwn kai\ a)mici/a| diai/ths o)/gkon h(gemoni/as kai\ semno/thta mimei=sqai dokou=sin, ou)d' o(tiou=n tw=n kolossikw=n diafe/rontes a)ndria/ntwn, oi(\ th\n
e)/cwqen h(rwikh\n kai\ qeopreph= morfh\n e)/xontes; e)nto/s

ei)si gh=s mestoi\ kai\ li/qou kai\ moli/bdou: plh\n o(/ti tw=n me\n a)ndria/ntwn tau=ta ta\ ba/rh th\n o)rqo/thta mo/nimon kai\ a)klinh= diafula/ttei, oi( d' a)pai/deutoi
 strathgoi\ kai\ h(gemo/nes u(po\ th=s e)nto\s a)gnwmosu/nhs polla/kis saleu/ontai kai\ peritre/pontai ba/sei ga\r

ou) keime/nh| pro\s o)rqa\s e)cousi/an e)poikodomou=ntes u(yhlh\n sunaponeu/ousi., dei= de/, w(/sper o( kanw\n
au)to/s, a)strabh\s geno/menos kai\ a)dia/strofos, ou(/tws a)peuqu/nei ta\ loipa\ th=| pro\s au(to\n e)farmogh=| kai\ paraqe/sei sunecomoiw=n, paraplhsi/ws to\n a)/rxonta

prw=ton au(to\n th\n a)rxh\n kthsa/menon e)n e(autw=| kai\ kateuqu/nanta th\n yuxh\n kai\ katasthsa/menon to\

h)=qos ou(/tw sunarmo/ttein to\ u(ph/koon ou)/te ga\r
pi/ptonto/s e)stin o)rqou=n ou)/te dida/skein a)gnoou=ntos
ou)/te kosmei=n a)kosmou=ntos h)\ ta/ttein a)taktou=ntos h)\
 a)/rxein mh\ a)rxome/nou: a)ll' oi( polloi\ kakw=s fronou=ntes
 oi)/ontai prw=ton e)n tw=| a)/rxein a)gaqo\n ei)=nai
to\ mh\ a)/rxesqai, kai\ o(/ ge *persw=n basileu\s pa/ntas
. h(gei=to dou/lous plh\n th=s au(tou= gunaiko/s, h(=s ma/lista despo/ths w)/feilen ei)=nai. ,

q.#text:
a)na/sta, w)= basileu=, kai\ fro/ntize pragma/twn, w(=n
 se fronti/zein o( me/gas *)wroma/sdhs h)qe/lhse:'

q: qew=n u(phresi/an ei)s ne/wn e)pime/leian kai\ swthri/an.

l: o(ra=|s to\n u(you= to/nd' a)/peiron ai)qe/ra,
kai\ gh=n pe/ric e)/xonq' u(grai=s e)n a)gka/lais;

p.#text:
ti/s ou)=n a)/rcei tou= a)/rxontos; o(  no/mos o(
 pa/ntwn basileu\s; qnatw=n te kai\ a)qana/twn: w(s
e)/fh *pi/ndaros, ou)k e)n bibli/ois e)/cw gegramme/nos ou)de/ tisi cu/lois, a)ll' e)/myuxos w)\n e)n au)tw=| lo/gos, a)ei\ sunoikw=n kai\ parafula/ttwn kai\ mhde/pote th\n yuxh\n
e)w=n e)/rhmon h(gemoni/as. o( me\n ga\r *persw=n basileu\s

e(/na tw=n kateunastw=n ei)=xe pro\s tou=to tetagme/non,
w(/sq' e(/wqen ei)sio/nta le/gein pro\s au)to\n
 tou= de\ pepaideume/nou kai\ swfronou=ntos a)/rxontos e)nto/s

e)stin o( tou=to fqeggo/menos a)ei\ kai\ parakeleuo/menos *pole/mwn ga\r e)/lege to\n e)/rwta ei)=nai   a)lhqe/steron
d' a)/n tis ei)/poi tou\s a)/rxontas u(phretei=n qew=| pro\s a)nqrw/pwn e)pime/leian kai\ swthri/an; o(/pws w(=n
 qeo\s di/dwsin a)nqrw/pois kalw=n kai\ a)gaqw=n ta\ me\n ne/mwsi ta\ de\ fula/ttwsin.

                  
o( me\n kaqi/hsin a)rxa\s sperma/twn proshko/ntwn gh=
d' a)nadi/dwsin, au)/cetai de\ ta\ me\n o)/mbrois ta\ d' a)ne/mois ta\ d' a)/strois e)piqalpo/mena kai\ selh/nh|,
 kosmei= d' h(/lios a(/panta kai\ pa=si tou=to dh\ to\ par' au(tou= fi/ltron e)gkera/nnusin.  a)lla\ tw=n toiou/twn
 kai\ thlikou/twn a(\ qeoi\ xari/zontai
dw/rwn kai\ a)gaqw=n
ou)k e)/stin a)po/lausis ou)de\ xrh=sis o)rqh\ di/xa no/mou kai\ di/khs kai\ a)/rxontos. di/kh me\n ou)=n no/mou te/los e)sti/, no/mos d' a)/rxontos e)/rgon, a)/rxwn d' ei)kw\n qeou= tou= pa/nta kosmou=ntos, ou) *feidi/ou deo/menos
 pla/ttontos ou)de\ *poluklei/tou kai\ *mu/rwnos, a)ll' au)to\s au(to\n ei)s o(moio/thta qew=| di' a)reth=s   kaqista\s;
 kai\ dhmiourgw=n a)galma/twn to\ h(\diston o)fqh=nai kai\ qeoprepe/staton. oi(=on d' h(\lion e)n ou)ranw=|
perikalle\s ei)/dwlon e(autou= kai\ selh/nhn o(. qeo\s
 e)ni/druse, toiou=ton e)n po/lesi mi/mhma kai\ fe/ggos
a)/rxwn  o(/ste qeoudh\s eu)diki/as; a)ne/xh|si , toute/sti qeou= lo/gon e)/xwn dia/noian, ou) skh=ptron ou)de\ kerauno\n ou)de\ tri/ainan, w(s e)/nioi pla/ttousin e(autou\s kai\ gra/fousi tw=| a)nefi/ktw| poiou=ntes e)pi/fqonon

to\ a)no/hton nemesa=| ga\r o( qeo\s toi=s
 a)pomimoume/nois bronta\s kai\ keraunou\s kai\ a)ktinoboli/as,
 tou\s de\ th\n a)reth\n zhlou=ntas au)tou= kai\ pro\s
to\ kalo\n kai\ fila/nqrwpon a)fomoiou=ntas e(autou\s h(do/menos au)/cei kai\ metadi/dwsi th=s peri\ au)to\n eu)nomi/as

kai\ di/khs kai\ a)lhqei/as kai\ prao/thtos: w(=n qeio/teron ou) pu=r e)stin ou) fw=s ou)x h(li/ou dro/mos ou)k a)natolai\ kai\ du/seis a)/strwn ou) to\ a)i/dion kai\
a)qa/naton. ou) ga\r xro/nw| zwh=s o( qeo\s eu)dai/mwn a)lla\ th=s a)reth=s tw=| a)/rxonti tou=to ga\r qei=o/n e)sti,
 kalo\n d' au)th=s kai\ to\ a)rxo/menon.

l: w(s de\ ku/nes peri\ mh=la duswrh/sontai e)n au)lh=|,

p.#text:
*)ana/carxos me\n ou)=n e)pi\ tw=| *klei/tou fo/nw|
deinopaqou=nta paramuqou/menos *)ale/candron e)/fh kai\

tw=| *dii\ th\n *di/khn ei)=nai kai\ th\n *qe/min pare/drous,
i(/na pa=n pratto/menon u(po\ basile/ws qemito\n dokh=|
 kai\ di/kaion: ou)k o)rqw=s ou)d' w)feli/mws th\n e)f' oi(=s h(/marte meta/noian au)tou= tw=| pro\s ta\ o(/moia qarru/nein i)w/menos. ei) de\ dei= tau=t' ei)ka/zein, o( me\n *zeu\s ou)k e)/xei th\n *di/khn pa/redron, a)ll' au)to\s *di/kh kai\ *qe/mis e)sti\ kai\ no/mwn o( presbu/tatos kai\ teleio/tatos.

oi( de\ palaioi\ ou(/tw le/gousi kai\ gra/fousi kai\ dida/skousin, w(s a)/neu *di/khs a)/rxein mhde\ tou= *dio\s kalw=s duname/nou   kaq'
*(hsi/odon a)dia/fqoros, ai)dou=s kai\ swfrosu/nhs kai\
w)felei/as su/noikos o(/qen  prosagoreu/ousi
 tou\s basilei=s: ma/lista, ga\r ai)dei=sqai prosh/kei toi=s

h(/kista foboume/nois. fobei=sqai de\ dei= to\n a)/rxonta tou= paqei=n kakw=s ma=llon to\ poih=sai: tou=to ga\r
ai)/tio/n e)stin e)kei/nou kai\ ou(=to/s e)stin o( fo/bos tou= a)/rxontos fila/nqrwpos kai\ ou)k a)gennh/s:, u(pe\r tw=n
 a)rxome/nwn dedie/nai mh\ la/qwsi blabe/ntes,
 ou)x u(pe\r au(tw=n a)ll' u(pe\r tw=n fulattome/nwn. o(
d' *)epameinw/ndas, ei)s e(orth/n tina kai\ po/ton a)neime/nws

                   tw=n *qhbai/wn r(ue/ntwn, mo/nos e)fw/deue ta\ o(/pla kai\ ta\ tei/xh, nh/fein le/gwn kai\ a)grupnei=n
w(s a)\n e)ch=| toi=s a)/llois mequ/ein kai\ kaqeu/dein. kai\ *ka/twn e)n *)itu/kh| 'tou\s: a)/llous a(/pantas a)po\ th=s h(\tths e)kh/rutte pe/mpein e)pi\ qa/lattan: kai\ e)mbiba/sas,
 eu)/ploian eu)ca/menos u(pe\r au)tw=n, ei)s oi)=kon e)panelqw\n e(auto\n a)pe/sface dida/cas u(pe\r ti/nwn dei= to\n
a)/rxonta; tw=| fo/bw| xrh=sqai kai\ ti/nwn dei= to\n a)/rxonta katafronei=n. *kle/arxos d' o( *pontiko\s tu/rannos ei)s kibwto\n e)nduo/menos w(/sper o)/fis e)ka/qeude.

                   kai\ *)aristo/dhmos o( *)argei=os ei)s u(perw=|on oi)/khma qu/ran e)/xon e)pirrakth/n, h(=s e)pa/nw tiqei\s to\ klini/dion
e)ka/qeude meta\ th=s e(tai/ras: h( de\ mh/thr e)kei/nhs u(fei=lke ka/twqen to\ klima/kion, ei)=q' h(me/ras pa/lin proseti/qei fe/rousa. pw=s ou(=tos, oi)/esqe, to\
 qe/atron e)pefri/kei kai\ to\ a)rxei=on, to\ bouleuth/rion,
to\ sumpo/sion, o( to\n qa/lamon e(autw=| desmwth/rion
pepoihkw/s; tw=| ga\r o)/nti dedi/asin oi( basilei=s u(pe\r
 tw=n a)rxome/nwn, oi( de\ tu/rannoi tou\s a)rxome/nous
dio\ duna/mei to\ de/os sunau/cousi pleio/nwn ga\r a)/rxontes plei/onas fobou=ntai.

ou) ga\r ei)ko\s ou)de\ pre/pon, w(/sper e)/nioi filo/sofoi
 le/gousi, to\n qeo\n e)n u(/lh| pa/nta pasxou/sh| kai\ pra/gmasi muri/as dexome/nois a)na/gkas kai\ tu/xas
kai\ metabola\s u(pa/rxein a)namemigme/non a)ll' o( me\n a)/nw pou peri\ th\n a)ei\ kata\ tau)ta\ ou(/tw fu/sin e)/xousan i(drume/nos e)n ba/qrois a(gi/ois, h(=| fhsi *pla/twn,
 eu)qei/a| perai/nei kata\ fu/sin periporeuo/menos
oi(=on d' h(/lios e)n ou)ranw=| mi/mhma to\ perikalle\s au)tou= di' e)so/ptrou ei)/dwlon a)nafai/netai toi=s e)kei=non e)nora=n di' au)tou= dunatoi=s, ou(/tw to\ e)n po/lesi fe/ggos eu)diki/as kai\ lo/gou tou= peri\ au(to\n w(/sper

                  
ei)ko/na kate/sthsen, h(\n oi( maka/rioi kai\ sw/frones e)k filosofi/as a)pogra/fontai pro\s to\ ka/lliston tw=n
pragma/twn pla/ttontes e(autou/s. tau/thn d' ou)de\n e)mpoiei= th\n dia/qesin h)\ lo/gos e)k filosofi/as parageno/menos: i(/na mh\ pa/sxwmen to\ tou= *)aleca/ndrou,

o(\s e)n *kori/nqw| *dioge/nhn qeasa/menos kai\ di' eu)fui+/an a)gaph/sas kai\ qauma/sas to\ fro/nhma kai\ to\ me/geqos
ta)ndro\s ei)=pen   o)li/gou de/wn ei)pei=n, th\n peri\ au(to\n eu)tuxi/an kai\ lampro/thta kai\ du/namin w(s kw/lusin
 a)reth=s kai\ a)sxoli/an baruno/menos kai\ zhlotupw=n to\n tri/bwna kai\ th\n ph/ran, o(/ti tou/tois h)=n a)ni/khtos
 kai\ a)na/lwtos *dioge/nhs, ou)x w(s e)kei=nos o(/plois
kai\ i(/ppois kai\ sari/ssais. e)ch=n ou)=n filosofou=nta kai\ th=| diaqe/sei gi/gnesqai *dioge/nhn kai\ th=| tu/xh| me/nein *)ale/candron, kai\ dia\ tou=to gene/sqai *dioge/nhn ma=llon, o(/ti h)=n *)ale/candros, w(s pro\s tu/xhn
 mega/lhn polu\ pneu=ma kai\ sa/lon e)/xousan e(/rmatos pollou= kai\ kubernh/tou mega/lou deo/menon.

quote.l: au)ti/k' e)/peita/ ge  mu=qos e)/hn, tete/lesto de\ e)/rgon.

l: ei)/kei ga\r h)/dh qumo\s ou)d' e)/t' a)nte/xei,

p.#text:
e)n me\n ga\r toi=s a)sqene/si kai\ tapeinoi=s kai\ i)diw/tais tw=| a)duna/tw| mignu/menon to\ a)no/hton ei)s to\ a)nama/rthton teleuta=| , w(/sper e)n o)nei/rasi fau/lois
 tis a)ni  th\n yuxh\n diatara/ttei sunecanasth=nai
 tai=s e)piqumi/ais
mh\ duname/nhn h( d' e)cousi/a paralabou=sa th\n kaki/an neu=ra toi=s pa/qesi prosti/qhsi kai\ to\ tou= *dionusi/ou a)lhqe/s e)stin: e)/fh ga\r a)polau/ein ma/lista th=s a)rxh=s, o(/tan taxe/ws a(\ bou/letai
 poih=|. me/gas ou)=n o( ki/ndunos bou/lesqai a(\ mh\ dei= to\n a(\ bou/letai poiei=n duna/menon:
 o)cu\n h( kaki/a dia\ th=s e)cousi/as dro/mon e)/xousa pa=n
 pa/qos e)cwqei=, poiou=sa th\n o)rgh\n fo/non to\n e)/rwta moixei/an th\n pleoneci/an dh/meusin.
 kai\ a)po/lwlen o( proskrou/sas: u(po/noia, kai\ te/qnhken

                  
o( diablhqei/s. a)ll' w(/sper oi( fusikoi\ le/gousi th\n a)straph\n th=s bronth=s u(ste/ran me\n e)kpi/ptein
w(s ai(=ma trau/matos, prote/ran de\ fai/nesqai, to\n me\n yo/fon e)kdexome/nhs th=s a)koh=s tw=| de\ fwti\ th=s
o)/yews a)pantw/shs: ou(/tws e)n tai=s a)rxai=s fqa/nousin

ai( kola/seis ta\s kathgori/as kai\ proekpi/ptousin ai( katadi/kai tw=n a)podei/cewn.

a)\n mh\ ba/ros e)/xwn 5 logismo\s e)piqli/bh| kai\ pie/zh|
 th\n e)cousi/an, mimoume/nou to\n h(/lion tou= a)/rxontos,

o(\s o(/tan: u(/ywma la/bh| me/giston, e)carqei\s e)n toi=s borei/ois, e)la/xista kinei=tai, tw=| sxolaiote/rw| to\n dro/mon ei)s a)sfale\s kaqista/menos.

ou)de\ ga\r laqei=n oi(=o/n te ta\s kaki/as e)n tai=s
 e)cousi/ais: a)lla\ tou\s me\n e)pilhptikou/s, a)\n e)n u(/yei tini\ ge/nwntai kai\ perienexqw=sin, i)/liggos i)/sxei kai\ sa/los, e)cele/gxwn to\ pa/qos au)tw=n, tou\s d' a)paideu/tous kai\ a)maqei=s h( tu/xh mikro\n e)kkoufi/sasa plou/tois tisi\n h)\ do/cais h)\ a)rxai=s metew/rous genome/nous

eu)qu\s,e(pidei/knusi pi/ptontas: ma=llon d'.', w(/sper
 tw=n kenw=n a)ggei/wn ou)k a)\n diagnoi/hs to\ a)ke/raion kai\ peponhko/s, a)ll' o(/tan e)gxe/h|s, fai/netai to\ r(e/on
 ou(/tws; ai( saqrai\ yuxai\ ta\s e)cousi/as mh\ ste/gousai r(e/ousin e)/cw tai=s e)piqumi/ais, tai=s o)rgai=s, tai=s a)lazonei/ais,
 tai=s a)peirokali/ais kai/toi ti/ dei= tau=ta le/gein, o(/pou kai\ ta\ smikro/tata tw=n e)lleimma/twn peri\ tou\s e)pifanei=s kai\ e)ndo/cous sukofantei=tai; *ki/mwnos
h)=n o( oi)=nos diabolh/, *skipi/wnos o( u(/pnos, *leu/kollos
e)pi\ tw=| deipnei=n polutele/steron h)/koue kakw=s.
